channel.title: math.GM updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GM updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Investigation about a statement equivalent to Riemann Hypothesis (RH) applied to Dirichlet primitive L functions
item.description: arXiv:2412.00169v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We try to apply a known equivalence, for RH about Riemann Z function, to Dirichlet L functions with primitive characters. The aim is to give a small contribution to the proof of the generalized version of Riemann Hypothesis (RH).
item.dc:creator: Giovanni Lodone
